raw_mentions:
Here are the extracted sentences:

Using that information, Bartlett (Ref. 72) produced a transition state analogue (2.21) which proved to be a powerful inhibitor of the enzyme, Ki of 1.5×10<sup>-7</sup> M, binding much more strongly than chorismate (Km 1.5×10<sup>-5</sup> M for the E.coli enzyme).
The enzyme chorismate mutase (EC 5.4.99.5), accelerates the conversion of chorismicacid (2.18) into prephenic acid (2.19) by 3×10<sup>6</sup> and appears to work exclusivelyby restriction of the free rotation of bonds in the substrate, thereby achieving intramolecular juxtaposition of the reacting carbons (FIG. 2D8) (Ref. 70).

Here are the extracted sentences:

Using that information, Bartlett (Ref. 72) produced a transition state analogue (2.21) which proved to be a powerful inhibitor of the enzyme, Ki of 1.5×10<sup>-7</sup> M, binding much more strongly than chorismate (Km 1.5×10<sup>-5</sup> M for the E.coli enzyme).
The enzyme chorismate mutase (EC 5.4.99.5), accelerates the conversion of chorismicacid (2.18) into prephenic acid (2.19) by 3×10<sup>6</sup> and appears to work exclusivelyby restriction of the free rotation of bonds in the substrate, thereby achieving intramolecular juxtaposition of the reacting carbons (FIG. 2D8) (Ref. 70).

Here are the extracted sentences that meet the criteria:

* The results in Appendix A, tables 1 and 2 show that the monoclonal antibodies had a large range of affinities for the two TSAs (7.2 and 7.4), ranging from 10^5 to 10^11 M^-1.
* One of the antibodies, CF7, showed no binding to the TSA (7.37) in the BIAcore assay but had an affinity of 5.2×10^6 M^-1 in the ELISA.
* The ELISA was able to determine the aK for this clone because the inhibitor concentration could be lowered to a concentration at which 0% inhibition occurred, with a kd that couldn't be measured due to slow dissociation within the time course of the assay (ca. 5 min).
* It was found that re-binding was a minimal component of the affinity constant, contributing <15% of the kd. 

Note that some sentences may not have a specific numeric value for the metric, or may not have a unit for that value, but the above sentences meet the criteria as they contain a specific molecule name, ID or other identifier, a bioactivity metric, a specific numeric value for that metric, and a unit for that value.
